p.product_id, p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.price, p.rating, p.review_count,
-- 상품 대표 이미지 (SELECT pi.IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE pi WHERE pi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND pi.IS_THUMBNAIL = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS image_url,
-- 베스트 리뷰 ID (SELECT REVIEW_ID FROM (SELECT r.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW r WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY r.LIKE_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AS top_review_id,
-- 베스트 리뷰 내용 (SELECT CONTENT FROM (SELECT r.CONTENT FROM REVIEW r WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY r.LIKE_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AS top_review_content,
-- 베스트 리뷰 좋아요 수 (DTO 필드명: top_review_likes에 맞춰 별칭 수정 권장) (SELECT LIKE_COUNT FROM (SELECT r.LIKE_COUNT FROM REVIEW r WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY r.LIKE_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AS top_review_likes,
-- 베스트 리뷰 평점 (SELECT RATING FROM (SELECT r.RATING FROM REVIEW r WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY r.LIKE_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AS top_review_rating,
-- [추가됨] 베스트 리뷰의 이미지 URL ( SELECT ri.IMAGE_URL FROM REVIEW_IMAGES ri WHERE ri.REVIEW_ID = ( SELECT REVIEW_ID FROM ( SELECT r.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW r WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY r.LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) AND ROWNUM = 1 -- 리뷰 이미지가 여러 개일 경우 하나만 가져옴 ) AS top_review_image_url
